mapper.select:
select subscription.Id subscription_id, subscription.MemberId subscription_memberId, subscription.SpvId subscription_spvId, subscription.LoanId subscription_loanId, subscription.LoanNumber subscription_loanNumber, subscription.ProductId subscription_productId, subscription.AmountLockId subscription_amountLockId, subscription.TransactionNumber subscription_transactionNumber, subscription.PayPlantformNumber subscription_payPlantformNumber, subscription.UmpayProductAccountNo subscription_umpayProductAccountNo, subscription.ProductName subscription_productName, subscription.ProductCode subscription_productCode, subscription.TradeStatus subscription_tradeStatus, subscription.InvestAmount subscription_investAmount, subscription.Shares subscription_shares, subscription.OrderTime subscription_orderTime, subscription.InterestRateDate subscription_interestRateDate, subscription.PaymentDate subscription_paymentDate, subscription.ExpectedExpirationDate subscription_expectedExpirationDate, subscription.ActualExpirationDate subscription_actualExpirationDate, subscription.ExpectedProfitRatio subscription_expectedProfitRatio, subscription.ExpectedProfit subscription_expectedProfit, subscription.SpvServiceFee subscription_spvServiceFee, subscription.SpvServiceFeeRatio subscription_spvServiceFeeRatio, subscription.ActualLoanAmount subscription_actualLoanAmount, subscription.LoanTime subscription_loanTime, subscription.LoanStatus subscription_loanStatus, subscription.Status subscription_status, subscription.DistributeStatus subscription_distributeStatus, subscription.DistributeTime subscription_distributeTime, subscription.IsBuyBack subscription_isBuyBack, subscription.CheckingStatus subscription_checkingStatus, subscription.CheckingTime subscription_checkingTime, subscription.ContractPath subscription_contractPath, subscription.Remark subscription_remark, productAmountLock.Id productAmountLock_id, productAmountLock.ProductId productAmountLock_productId, productAmountLock.SpvId productAmountLock_spvId, productAmountLock.MemberId productAmountLock_memberId, productAmountLock.ProductName productAmountLock_productName, productAmountLock.ProductCode productAmountLock_productCode, productAmountLock.TransactionNumber productAmountLock_transactionNumber, productAmountLock.PayPlantformNumber productAmountLock_payPlantformNumber, productAmountLock.UmpayProductAccountNo productAmountLock_umpayProductAccountNo, productAmountLock.LockAmount productAmountLock_lockAmount, productAmountLock.Shares productAmountLock_shares, productAmountLock.IntoStatus productAmountLock_intoStatus, productAmountLock.HandleStatus productAmountLock_handleStatus, productAmountLock.FinishTime productAmountLock_finishTime, productAmountLock.SubsTime productAmountLock_subsTime, productAmountLock.ExpireTime productAmountLock_expireTime, productAmountLock.Remark productAmountLock_remark, spvCorporation.Id spvCorporation_id, spvCorporation.Type spvCorporation_type, spvCorporation.Code spvCorporation_code, spvCorporation.UmpayAccountNo spvCorporation_umpayAccountNo, spvCorporation.AvailableAmount spvCorporation_availableAmount, spvCorporation.FrozenAmount spvCorporation_frozenAmount, spvCorporation.UmpayMerchantNo spvCorporation_umpayMerchantNo, spvCorporation.Name spvCorporation_name, spvCorporation.ShortName spvCorporation_shortName, spvCorporation.BankName spvCorporation_bankName, spvCorporation.BankCode spvCorporation_bankCode, spvCorporation.BankCardNumber spvCorporation_bankCardNumber, spvCorporation.SignaturePicPath spvCorporation_signaturePicPath, spvCorporation.Phone spvCorporation_phone, spvCorporation.Fax spvCorporation_fax, spvCorporation.PostCode spvCorporation_postCode, spvCorporation.Address spvCorporation_address, spvCorporation.Description spvCorporation_description, spvCorporation.Status spvCorporation_status, spvCorporation.CreateTime spvCorporation_createTime, spvCorporation.ModifyTime spvCorporation_modifyTime, loan.Id loan_id, loan.SpvId loan_spvId, loan.ProductId loan_productId, loan.TradeNumber loan_tradeNumber, loan.PayPlantformNumber loan_payPlantformNumber, loan.ProductName loan_productName, loan.ProductCode loan_productCode, loan.TotalLoanAmount loan_totalLoanAmount, loan.SpvServiceFee loan_spvServiceFee, loan.SpvServiceFeeRatio loan_spvServiceFeeRatio, loan.LoanTime loan_loanTime, loan.LoanStatus loan_loanStatus, loan.CheckingTime loan_checkingTime, loan.CheckingStatus loan_checkingStatus, loan.Remark loan_remark, product.Id product_id, product.BasicProductId product_basicProductId, product.SpvId product_spvId, product.CategoryId product_categoryId, product.AssetCategoryCode product_assetCategoryCode, product.Name product_name, product.Code product_code, product.TotalAmount product_totalAmount, product.SurplusAmount product_surplusAmount, product.FirstPublishTime product_firstPublishTime, product.UmpayAccountNo product_umpayAccountNo, product.Description product_description, product.Status product_status, product.DistributeStatus product_distributeStatus, product.CreatorId product_creatorId, product.CreateTime product_createTime, product.ModifierId product_modifierId, product.ModifyTime product_modifyTime, product.IsDelete product_isDelete, product.Sort product_sort, product.ViewName product_viewName from TC_Subscription subscription inner join TC_ProductAmountLock productAmountLock on productAmountLock.Id=subscription.AmountLockId inner join CC_SpvCorporation spvCorporation on spvCorporation.Id=subscription.SpvId inner join TC_Loan loan on loan.Id=subscription.LoanId inner join PC_Product product on product.Id=subscription.ProductId
and Id=${id} and MemberId=${memberId} and SpvId=${spvId} and LoanId=${loanId} and LoanNumber=#{loanNumber} and ProductId=${productId} and AmountLockId=${amountLockId} and TransactionNumber=#{transactionNumber} and PayPlantformNumber=#{payPlantformNumber} and UmpayProductAccountNo=#{umpayProductAccountNo} and ProductName=#{productName} and ProductCode=#{productCode} and TradeStatus=${tradeStatus} and InvestAmount=${investAmount} and Shares=${shares} and OrderTime=#{orderTime} and InterestRateDate=#{interestRateDate} and PaymentDate=#{paymentDate} and ExpectedExpirationDate=#{expectedExpirationDate} and ActualExpirationDate=#{actualExpirationDate} and ExpectedProfitRatio=${expectedProfitRatio} and ExpectedProfit=${expectedProfit} and SpvServiceFee=${spvServiceFee} and SpvServiceFeeRatio=${spvServiceFeeRatio} and ActualLoanAmount=${actualLoanAmount} and LoanTime=#{loanTime} and LoanStatus=${loanStatus} and Status=${status} and DistributeStatus=${distributeStatus} and DistributeTime=#{distributeTime} and IsBuyBack=${isBuyBack} and CheckingStatus=${checkingStatus} and CheckingTime=#{checkingTime} and ContractPath=#{contractPath} and Remark=#{remark}

select Id subscription_id, MemberId subscription_memberId, SpvId subscription_spvId, LoanId subscription_loanId, LoanNumber subscription_loanNumber, ProductId subscription_productId, AmountLockId subscription_amountLockId, TransactionNumber subscription_transactionNumber, PayPlantformNumber subscription_payPlantformNumber, UmpayProductAccountNo subscription_umpayProductAccountNo, ProductName subscription_productName, ProductCode subscription_productCode, TradeStatus subscription_tradeStatus, InvestAmount subscription_investAmount, Shares subscription_shares, OrderTime subscription_orderTime, InterestRateDate subscription_interestRateDate, PaymentDate subscription_paymentDate, ExpectedExpirationDate subscription_expectedExpirationDate, ActualExpirationDate subscription_actualExpirationDate, ExpectedProfitRatio subscription_expectedProfitRatio, ExpectedProfit subscription_expectedProfit, SpvServiceFee subscription_spvServiceFee, SpvServiceFeeRatio subscription_spvServiceFeeRatio, ActualLoanAmount subscription_actualLoanAmount, LoanTime subscription_loanTime, LoanStatus subscription_loanStatus, Status subscription_status, DistributeStatus subscription_distributeStatus, DistributeTime subscription_distributeTime, IsBuyBack subscription_isBuyBack, CheckingStatus subscription_checkingStatus, CheckingTime subscription_checkingTime, ContractPath subscription_contractPath, Remark subscription_remark from TC_Subscription

select Id subscription_id, MemberId subscription_memberId, SpvId subscription_spvId, LoanId subscription_loanId, LoanNumber subscription_loanNumber, ProductId subscription_productId, AmountLockId subscription_amountLockId, TransactionNumber subscription_transactionNumber, PayPlantformNumber subscription_payPlantformNumber, UmpayProductAccountNo subscription_umpayProductAccountNo, ProductName subscription_productName, ProductCode subscription_productCode, TradeStatus subscription_tradeStatus, InvestAmount subscription_investAmount, Shares subscription_shares, OrderTime subscription_orderTime, InterestRateDate subscription_interestRateDate, PaymentDate subscription_paymentDate, ExpectedExpirationDate subscription_expectedExpirationDate, ActualExpirationDate subscription_actualExpirationDate, ExpectedProfitRatio subscription_expectedProfitRatio, ExpectedProfit subscription_expectedProfit, SpvServiceFee subscription_spvServiceFee, SpvServiceFeeRatio subscription_spvServiceFeeRatio, ActualLoanAmount subscription_actualLoanAmount, LoanTime subscription_loanTime, LoanStatus subscription_loanStatus, Status subscription_status, DistributeStatus subscription_distributeStatus, DistributeTime subscription_distributeTime, IsBuyBack subscription_isBuyBack, CheckingStatus subscription_checkingStatus, CheckingTime subscription_checkingTime, ContractPath subscription_contractPath, Remark subscription_remark from TC_Subscription where Id=${id}

select Id subscription_id, MemberId subscription_memberId, SpvId subscription_spvId, LoanId subscription_loanId, LoanNumber subscription_loanNumber, ProductId subscription_productId, AmountLockId subscription_amountLockId, TransactionNumber subscription_transactionNumber, PayPlantformNumber subscription_payPlantformNumber, UmpayProductAccountNo subscription_umpayProductAccountNo, ProductName subscription_productName, ProductCode subscription_productCode, TradeStatus subscription_tradeStatus, InvestAmount subscription_investAmount, Shares subscription_shares, OrderTime subscription_orderTime, InterestRateDate subscription_interestRateDate, PaymentDate subscription_paymentDate, ExpectedExpirationDate subscription_expectedExpirationDate, ActualExpirationDate subscription_actualExpirationDate, ExpectedProfitRatio subscription_expectedProfitRatio, ExpectedProfit subscription_expectedProfit, SpvServiceFee subscription_spvServiceFee, SpvServiceFeeRatio subscription_spvServiceFeeRatio, ActualLoanAmount subscription_actualLoanAmount, LoanTime subscription_loanTime, LoanStatus subscription_loanStatus, Status subscription_status, DistributeStatus subscription_distributeStatus, DistributeTime subscription_distributeTime, IsBuyBack subscription_isBuyBack, CheckingStatus subscription_checkingStatus, CheckingTime subscription_checkingTime, ContractPath subscription_contractPath, Remark subscription_remark from TC_Subscription order by Id asc limit ${start},${offset}
